Sentencas: Ceramic hollow fibre membranes which have an asymmetric structure have been prepared in one step, using an immersion induced phase inversion technique.
Titulo: Ceramic asymmetric hollow fibre membranes-One step fabrication process

Sentencas: With this method, membranes with a high surface area per unit volume ratio can be produced, while production cost is dramatically reduced.
Titulo: Ceramic asymmetric hollow fibre membranes-One step fabrication process

Sentencas: Yttria-stabilised zirconia (YSZ) is selected as a membrane material, as it is relatively inexpensive and has superior mechanical strength as well as oxygen ion conducting properties.
Titulo: Ceramic asymmetric hollow fibre membranes-One step fabrication process

Sentencas: Therefore, both the porous and non-porous membranes prepared from the YSZ have potential applications.
Titulo: Ceramic asymmetric hollow fibre membranes-One step fabrication process

Sentencas: For example, the porous YSZ membranes can be used for fluid separations in harsh environments where normal polymeric membranes cannot be sustained, while the non-porous YSZ membranes can be applied as a solid electrolyte in electrochemical devices such as solid oxide fuel cells, oxygen pumps and chemical gas sensors.
Titulo: Ceramic asymmetric hollow fibre membranes-One step fabrication process

Sentencas: Gas permeation analysis suggests that non-porous YSZ hollow fibre membranes can be prepared at sintering temperature of 1400 degrees C or greater, below which the membrane contains pores.
Titulo: Ceramic asymmetric hollow fibre membranes-One step fabrication process

Sentencas: Pore sizes of the YSZ porous membrane prepared fall into the pore size range of ultrafiltration membranes.
Titulo: Ceramic asymmetric hollow fibre membranes-One step fabrication process

Sentencas: However, the surface porosities of the membranes prepared from two-population sized particles at sintering temperatures of 1200 degrees C and 1400 degrees C are around 5000 m(-1) and 300 m(-1), respectively.
Titulo: Ceramic asymmetric hollow fibre membranes-One step fabrication process

Sentencas: The former is comparable to polymeric membranes, while the latter is an order of the magnitude smaller.
Titulo: Ceramic asymmetric hollow fibre membranes-One step fabrication process
